text: Donald Louis Carcieri ( ; ; born December 16, 1942) is an American politician and businessman. He was the 73rd Governor of Rhode Island from January 2003 to January 2011.RI Gov.: Out of the Spotlight, Fogarty Threatening Carcieri Lauren Phillips, CQ Politics, July 5, 2006 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Rhode Island Category:Businesspeople from Rhode Island Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:21st-century Roman Catholics
title: Donald Carcieri
